meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of molecules.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the molecular structure of the compound.
meanings.sent2: Water is made up of tiny molecular units.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were so small, they seemed almost molecular in size.
meanings.sent4: The molecular bond between the atoms was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The detective used a molecular analysis to solve the case.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of molecules.
meanings.sent1: The molecular properties of the substance were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The smell was a molecular signature of the specific chemical.
meanings.sent3: The party had a molecular theme, with decorations resembling atoms.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a molecular connection, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the molecular essence of the material in the sculpture.
